entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with ice pellets before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets mixed with snow at times heavy in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
